Home Publications Rewards Students

Brief biography

王万元，副教授。2016年毕业于东南大学获得博士学位，2017年新加坡南洋理工大学从事博士后研究工作。研究方向主要为多智能系统，运筹优化，强化学习以及博弈论，及其在协同决策系统、智能交通等方面的应用。欢迎致力于算法解决实际问题的研究生报考！

Latest News

  • [ 2019 ] A paper "Towards Efficient City-Scale Patrolling Using Decomposition and Grafting" is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems
  • [ 2019 ] A paper "Strategic Social Team Crowdsourcing Forming a Team of Truthful Workers for Crowdsourcing in Social Networks" is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing

Research Interests

  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Multiagent Systems
  • Operations Research
  • Game Theory

Education

  • BS in Science, Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, China, 2007-2011.
  • Ph.D in Computer Science, Southeast University, China, 2011-2016.
  • Postdoc in Computer Science, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, 2016-2017.
